task.title: Change Application Fonts
task.shortdesc: Change tier fonts and/or user interface (UI) fonts.

context.p: From the Fonts tab of the Preferences dialog:

step.cmd: Click the font listed underneath each UI element to change it.
step.stepresult: The Choose font dialog will appear.

step.cmd: Choose the desired Font and Size, select Bold and/or Italic if required, then click Ok.
step.stepresult: The font displayed in Session Editor will reflect your choices.

step.cmd: Adjust size for all UI fonts using the slider.

stepresult.note: To reset default options for a UI element, mouse over that element and click the Reset to default button which appears on the right.
